text: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality.

When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.
The elderly had their time in Washington protesting for around a year.
They were met with violence and were eventually forced to leave the capital.
Not that they wanted to be there in the first place.
The drug that was affecting people at over 85 has a one side effect, well, despite the fact that they would be immortal looking how they look at the age of 85 and not at the age of 28.
The side effect is this: If you're over 85 years old, you will turn into a zombie.
And worse, all the elderly who took the drug have now turned into zombies and infecting people they bite.
The protesters have a safe haven in Washington, where no reported zombies in the area.
It was too late though.
More than half of the population of the United States have turned into zombies.
Only parts of the Northeast are safe.
The government seem to have given up on the fight and are just trying to keep the remaining population alive.
Even if the young and the powerful are now immortal, they are still susceptible to the zombies.
One of the scientists who created the drug is trying to find a cure.
The year is now 2029.
Just around a decade ago humanity had a similar pandemic, but this time it's worse.
The zombies are now immune to all weapons and are even more dangerous.
They are mindless, but they are still able to communicate with each other.
After all, they are still human.
The zombies are now more organized and have formed a sort of army.
The last hope for humanity is a group of people who are immune to the zombie virus.
And they are the 85 year olds that did not take the drug.
Their blood turns back the zombies into their human form.
But it is a long fight, and we are still fighting.
